title: (x) What is this "Satori" script? - Freestyle Script {Lex}
content:
Hello.

The font called “Satori” worked on my last 3 Mac computers. I just got new Mac Pro and the font doesn’t work on this one. This font is from February 1995....  
Is there a place to buy this font? I searched for it but could not find it. Is there anything close to this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203113418im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/warning_5498.jpg)

 [‹ Looking for a specific motif/ornament swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203113418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37575 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Unsere Neubau-wohnung squarish wide retro-futuristic sans - Microgramma {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203113418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38432 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content:
I know this one as Freestyle script.

- Lex
